name: small-business-customer-care
description: MCP Server for Small Business Customer Care Management - Manage business data through natural language with Claude Desktop
author: Ravi Kalla

tools.name: list_businesses
tools.description: Get a list of all businesses with their details

tools.name: search_businesses
tools.description: Search businesses by name, category, or description

instructions: Run 'mvn clean package' to build the JAR
Configure Claude Desktop with the JAR path
